text: They have some healthier options, but as far as their regular pizza goes I wasn't impressed. Second time was somewhat better with using alfredo as sauce. But they do offer delivery through grubhub.

name: Local Runner
text: Good gluten free crust but if it was a little thicker it would be great. Unlimited toppings, special sauces, different types of cheese, etc. It is really made the way you want it and each little thing added doesn‚Äôt cost more. The gluten free crust is an extra $2.50 but it is worth it when that‚Äôs all you can eat.

text:
Fast food pizza...it's like Chipotle & Subway in that you order from menu or create your own and the pizza is cooked in 5 min.  They now offer sandwiches.
Gluten free options available.

text: Good pizza ,great flavor.. good service

text: Awesome place to eat and very low prices and can make your own pizzas for such a low price

name: John Hert
text: Very unique pizza place.really good prices ,fresh ingredients,a good variety of toppings and sauces. very short wait for the pizza to bake. They also have good fresh salads and 3 different desserts to choose from.

name: Jana Baker
text:
Pretty good pizza fast. Has one of those Coke "make your soda however you want it to taste"  machines. I'm surprised the place isn't busier!
NOTE: Returned this week. Never greeted... Barely acknowledged by the 2 employees in plain sight. There were 5 total customers in the place.

name: Sasha O'Brien
text: Got the dessert bundle. BBQ Chicken pizza w/o red onions and with the new itallian crust. AMAZING! Got the brownie dessert, super thick and choclatey, just the way I like it. The kind of brownie that needs a glass of milk. YUM! Staff was ‚Ä¶More

name: Jacoshio Propst
text: A very unique experience. Friendly service. Good food Prepared in front of you. You can put whatever you like on it. No charge for extra toppings. Nice views. Definitely worth it!

name: Tiwan Williams
text: Make sure you specify the kind of crust you want. I like the crisp crust. The traditional is good but too soft and weak. Fresh ingredients and flavorful sauce! Yum!

name: Linda Tilley
text: My friend and I visited today for the first time and don't know why we haven't visited before. The pizza was great! One has their choice of sizes, crust, cheese and toppings, no limit to toppings for one price. All baked in 5 minutes. It ‚Ä¶More

text: Best pizza I've ever had! It's like Subway but for pizza, choose your crust, choose your toppings and sauce and 3 minutes it's done. I will definitely be going back. Seriously the crust, sauce and cheese is very fresh and so many toppings ‚Ä¶More

text: My family and I went to take advantage of the discounted pizza special for œÄ Day. Because the line was so long, we told our 10 year old to grab a seat while we waited. Once we finally got to order, I ordered my pizza, my girlfriend ordered ‚Ä¶More

text: This is where you go when you want fresh and delicious pizza.  Service is very friendly,  smiles all around and the ingredients look fresh, robust and delicious.  No cost for extras such as cheese or toppings, pizza is done within minutes ‚Ä¶More

text: If you want freshly mad pizza in front of you go to Pie Five in Hickory, NC the around I go about every Sunday I'm off you get as much toppings you want for $8.01 that's after tax

name: Harley Williams
text: The idea of making a personal sized pizza that you can put whatever you want on it for one price is amazing. Also love getting the buy one get one free coupons on the mail. This is definitely my favorite pizza place ‚ù§Ô∏èüçï

name: Denna Harmon
text: Great pizza! They sell only one size, but you can put as many toppings as you want for the same price. The toppings are high quality, and they don't skimp. The staff was very nice and professional and I'll be back.

name: 828Nate
text: First time I've ever eaten at Pie Five. The restaurant was very clean. The staff was very pleasant. The food was amazing! Monday they do the 4.99 personal pizzas anyway you want it. These aren't little cheap pizzas either. They are awesome. I will be going back!!

text:
Pizza is nice... if the toppings stay on.

name: MelMarc Electric
text:
Great customer service from the time we walked through the door! After making our order I decided to order a second pizza-- they're personal size.
I had ground beef on one and BBQ chicken on the other with pan crust on both. They were really good! The crust was especially tasty.
I will be back!

name: Michael M
text: Nice place. Employees were very friendly.  Kids loved their pizza.  Was not crowded at all.

name: Daniel Benfield
text: Not the best pizza I've had but with the salad it is an awesome meal! They make the pizza fresh in front of you and the salad. I've not had anything bad here yet. Honestly it's probably my must favorite place to eat in Hickey because of how clean they are and it's fresh.

text: I love it here! They have gluten free pizza crust and vegan cheese! They are also service dog friendly. I've always enjoyed my time here and the food.

name: John Medford
text: Food is good and very fast, I like the style. It does get expensive fast given the add-ons, they could be better priced.

text: At one This was the best Pizza I'd ever put in my mouth. Til the owners decided to permanently close it down for whatever reason! I've honestly, never had pizza this good EVER..!!! ‚Ä¶More

text: One of my favorite places to eat. The ONLY pizza chain that has a certified gluten free crust and their cauliflower crust is to die for! Friendly staff and clean facility. A must for pizza lovers.

text: Sauce was a little to tangy for me, crust was really good though. Think it might have been better if I had got it well done.
